title: The Bachelorette winner? Angie Kent's heart goes wild for one contestant in fun challenge
text:
The Bachelorette's Angie Kent is on the hunt for love.

But the beautiful blonde may have revealed the winner of her season already after one contestant got her heart racing on Wednesday.

Appearing on KIIS FM's Kyle & Jackie 'O' Show, the former Gogglebox star took part in a heart rate monitor test - and the results were particularly revealing.

Angie was hooked up to the device while radio hosts Kyle Sandilands and Jackie 'O' Henderson showed her pictures of the remaining contestants.

As they discussed the merits of each eligible bachelor, the hosts kept a keen eye on Angie's heart rate.

And there was one chap who got Angie's pulse racing more than any other.

On the hunt for love: Angie Kent (pictured) may have revealed the winner of her season already after one contestant got her heart racing

When the trio began talking about contender Jackson Garlick, Angie's heart rate spiked to 126bpm.

'Do you like him?' Jackie asked Angie, to which she replied: 'Well I gave him a big old pash [kiss]'.'

Angie described Jackson as an 'excellent kisser' as the show's hosts debated whether he could be the season's winner.

Locking lips: Appearing on KIIS FM's Kyle & Jackie 'O' Show, the former Gogglebox star took part in a heart rate monitor test, and her heart started pulsing when she discussed contender Jackson Garlick

But later in the show, Angie was quick to give explanations about why her heart rate might have fluctuated.

'But that could also be because I threw up a lot on that day,' she said. 'I get motion sickness and I was in the helicopter.'

Angie had chosen the 25-year-old for a solo date but it wasn't long before it all went wrong.

Thankfully, Angie was able to hold it in until the helicopter landed safely back on the ground, after which she jumped out and could be heard vomiting.
description: The Bachelorette's Angie Kent is on the hunt for love.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
